post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Need a C programmer who can decipher legacy C programs.
Will be working on-site for about 6 - 8 weeks and need to have a good (English) communication skill.

If interested, email your resume to khboo@hotmail.com before Jun. 22, 2004.
post.title: Looking for a C programmer for a short term contract
